pageContext.claim: “There are no mixed messages, only political weaponization by people like you and your brother, Fredo! [quoting Gov. Andrew Cuomo of New York, who was lamenting mixed messages from the Trump administration on the covid-19 response]”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration for days sent mixed messages on whether it would use the Defense Production Act to mobilize industry and fill a shortage of ventilators and personal protective equipment. Cuomo had been calling on Trump to use his full powers under the act to ensure critical supplies got to New York. Trump said he didn't need to use the law, then changed his mind and said he would.
